column4: hi, does anyone know of an ubuntu package/project that will allow me to autocorrect blatant spelling mistakes in text?
it's because you can't... & can't install widgets wither :(  giv'em time they'll sort it out
it's taken the same line as first founfdin 10.04 netbook.  the panel is not for us plebs!

there's way around some missing add-ons; e.g. xpad instead of note, docky can do some others... but I miss the panel apps being available... most annoying other panel miss is no weather option for date/time
